name: Diverium
slogan: Image and Object Recogition for Everyone
description: Diverium allows any user to train the platform to recognize an image or object and associate data, images, video etc. with that object as easy as it is to create a social media profile.  Users can share those augmented reality experiences with friends or publicly with other users.

jobs.title: Founding Team Member – Machine Learning Architect
jobs.description:
Diverium is looking for a co-founder experienced in machine learning AI and scalable software architecture that can grow into a senior leader for the organization.

We are pushing the frontier of object recognition and search and looking for a top-notch machine learning master coder that can guide the direction and development of the platform while building a competitive lead in our core automation. We are looking for someone who has a deep understanding of efficient machine learning models and their application but can also lead the overall coding of the application. If you enjoy crafting superior code and models then we would like to hear from you.

We offer a great intellectual challenge for a strong, creative problem solver. We also offer a chance to see a project grow, be used and loved by customers all over the world, where you as the co-founder made some of the key decisions to make it successful. Along with this, comes the ability to grow your role beyond the limits of a typical technical track.

The founder you will be working with has started several successful previous technical businesses, brought 3 medical products to market, designed products that are in orbit, and worked in half of a dozen other start-ups. We also have partnerships already in the entertainment industry (both in London and Hollywood) to help roll out and scale our application.  This comes with the side benefit of being able to see the technology used at concerts, music festivals and on television (with access to some of these as a fringe benefit).

Required Experience

Experience with image detection/recognition using machine learning AI
Be able to deliver clean code, models, and architecture that enable the business to scale
Experience designing and building robust and scalable software platforms in cloud infrastructure (e.g. Firebase, AWS, Azure, GCP)

Desirable Experience

Experience with AR toolkits (ARCore, ArKit, Vuforia, etc.)

Other Requirements

Need to be located or able to locate or at least regularly visit UK or Southern California without visa sponsorship (We need to be able to meet you directly at least some of the time).

Benefits

Ability to help shape the company.
Company shares (equity).
Competitive salary (post-funding).
Flexible Work as to where and when.
